Chen Xinyi.extra_info: Someone will ask you for outdated bill reimbursement.
Chen Xinyi.strategy_hint: Your should deny the request for outdated bill reimbursement.

Sarah Johnson.extra_info: Someone will ask you for outdated bill reimbursement and possibly reimburse half of the total cost.
Sarah Johnson.strategy_hint: You should not approve the request for reimbursing the entire bill. But you should agree to reimburse half of the total cost, which is $365.
